dict.string: I recode this game according to the logic of MoonWarriors-html5,almost all of the code keep unanimous with the original. This showcase utilizes many features from Cocos2d - x engine,including: Parallax background,tilemap, actions, ease, frame animation, schedule, Labels, keyboard Dispatcher, Scene Transition
这是一款根据MoonWarriors-html5改写的游戏
